Uses of Class
javafx.scene.paint.CycleMethod

  • Packages that use CycleMethod 
    Package Description
    javafx.scene.paint
    Provides the set of classes for colors and gradients used to fill shapes and backgrounds when rendering the scene graph.

    • Uses of CycleMethod in javafx.scene.paint

      Methods in javafx.scene.paint that return CycleMethod 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CycleMethod LinearGradient.getCycleMethod()
      Defines which of the following cycle method is applied to the LinearGradient: CycleMethod.NO_CYCLE, CycleMethod.REFLECT, or CycleMethod.REPEAT.
      CycleMethod RadialGradient.getCycleMethod()
      Defines which of the follwing cycle method is applied to the LinearGradient: CycleMethod.NO_CYCLE, CycleMethod.REFLECT, or CycleMethod.REPEAT.
      static CycleMethod CycleMethod.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static CycleMethod[] CycleMethod.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Constructors in javafx.scene.paint with parameters of type CycleMethod 
      Constructor and Description
      LinearGradient(double startX, double startY, double endX, double endY, boolean proportional, CycleMethod cycleMethod, List<Stop> stops)
      Creates a new instance of LinearGradient.
      LinearGradient(double startX, double startY, double endX, double endY, boolean proportional, CycleMethod cycleMethod, Stop... stops)
      Creates a new instance of LinearGradient.
      RadialGradient(double focusAngle, double focusDistance, double centerX, double centerY, double radius, boolean proportional, CycleMethod cycleMethod, List<Stop> stops)
      Creates a new instance of RadialGradient.
      RadialGradient(double focusAngle, double focusDistance, double centerX, double centerY, double radius, boolean proportional, CycleMethod cycleMethod, Stop... stops)
      Creates a new instance of RadialGradient.
